Title: SSIS Auditing and Pipeline Tools
Description: The purpose of this project is to provide SSIS package tools for cleaner auditing and error recovery.  Planned tools are a Control Flow auditing package and a Data Flow pipeline to XML tool.  Others will be added as necessary.

Project Description
The purpose of this project is to provide SSIS package tools for cleaner auditing and error recovery. Planned tools are a Control Flow auditing package and a Data Flow pipeline to XML tool. Others will be added as necessary.
